name: Restorative Meal (T1)
description: A restorative meal steeped with fragrant blooms and stabilizing roots.
use: When consumed, you regain 2d4+2 hit points.

name: Fortifying Meal (T1)
description: A rich broth that bolsters endurance.
use: When consumed, you gain 5 temporary hit points for 1 hour.

name: Sustaining Rations (T1)
description: Compact rations sealed with resin to preserve energy.
use: For the next 8 hours, you have advantage on Constitution saving throws made to resist exhaustion from forced march, starvation, or harsh travel.

name: Focus Tea (T1)
description: A calming infusion that sharpens thought.
use: For 8 hours, you have 1 use(s): add 1d4 to an Int/Wis/Cha check after seeing the roll.

name: Battle Meal (T1)
description: A fiery dish that primes the body for combat.
use: For 1 minute after eating, you gain +1 to attack rolls and +1 to damage rolls.

name: Hero’s Feast (T1)
description: A legendary feast prepared from vital essence and rare botanicals.
use: Up to 12 creatures who partake gain 1d6 temporary hit points, and are cured of disease and poison.

name: Venomfire Dish (T1)
description: A dangerous dish that weaponizes venom and spores.
use: After eating, the next weapon hit within 1 hour deals an extra 1d4 poison damage. Target must succeed on a DC 11 Con save or be Poisoned until end of its next turn.

name: Restorative Meal (T2)
description: A restorative meal steeped with fragrant blooms and stabilizing roots.
use: When consumed, you regain 4d4+4 hit points.

name: Fortifying Meal (T2)
description: A rich broth that bolsters endurance.
use: When consumed, you gain 10 temporary hit points for 1 hour.

name: Sustaining Rations (T2)
description: Compact rations sealed with resin to preserve energy.
use: For the next 8 hours, you have advantage on Constitution saving throws made to resist exhaustion from forced march, starvation, or harsh travel.

name: Focus Tea (T2)
description: A calming infusion that sharpens thought.
use: For 8 hours, you have 1 use(s): add 1d4 to an Int/Wis/Cha check after seeing the roll.

name: Battle Meal (T2)

use: For 1 minute after eating, you gain +1 to attack rolls and +2 to damage rolls.

name: Hero’s Feast (T2)
description: A legendary feast prepared from vital essence and rare botanicals.
use: Up to 12 creatures who partake gain 2d6 temporary hit points, and are cured of disease and poison.

name: Venomfire Dish (T2)
description: A dangerous dish that weaponizes venom and spores.
use: After eating, the next weapon hit within 1 hour deals an extra 1d6 poison damage. Target must succeed on a DC 12 Con save or be Poisoned until end of its next turn.

use: When consumed, you regain 8d4+8 hit points.

name: Fortifying Meal (T3)
description: A rich broth that bolsters endurance.
use: When consumed, you gain 15 temporary hit points for 1 hour.

name: Sustaining Rations (T3)
description: Compact rations sealed with resin to preserve energy.
use: For the next 24 hours, you have advantage on Constitution saving throws made to resist exhaustion from forced march, starvation, or harsh travel.

use: For 8 hours, you have 2 use(s): add 1d6 to an Int/Wis/Cha check after seeing the roll.

use: For 1 minute after eating, you gain +1 to attack rolls and +3 to damage rolls.

use: When consumed, you regain 10d4+20 hit points.

use: After eating, the next weapon hit within 1 hour deals an extra 2d6 poison damage. Target must succeed on a DC 14 Con save or be Poisoned until end of its next turn.

name: Restorative Meal (T5)
description: A restorative meal steeped with fragrant blooms and stabilizing roots.
use: When consumed, you regain 12d4+24 hit points.

name: Fortifying Meal (T5)
description: A rich broth that bolsters endurance.
use: When consumed, you gain 30 temporary hit points for 1 hour.

name: Sustaining Rations (T5)
description: Compact rations sealed with resin to preserve energy.
use: For the next 24 hours, you have advantage on Constitution saving throws made to resist exhaustion from forced march, starvation, or harsh travel. If you are exhausted, reduce your exhaustion level by 1.

name: Focus Tea (T5)
description: A calming infusion that sharpens thought.
use: For 8 hours, you have 3 use(s): add 1d8 to an Int/Wis/Cha check after seeing the roll.

name: Battle Meal (T5)
description: A fiery dish that primes the body for combat.
use: For 1 minute after eating, you gain +2 to attack rolls and +4 to damage rolls.

name: Hero’s Feast (T5)
description: A legendary feast prepared from vital essence and rare botanicals.
use: Up to 12 creatures who partake gain 2d10 temporary hit points, and are cured of disease and poison.

name: Venomfire Dish (T5)
description: A dangerous dish that weaponizes venom and spores.
use: After eating, the next weapon hit within 1 hour deals an extra 2d8 poison damage. Target must succeed on a DC 15 Con save or be Poisoned until end of its next turn.

name: Restorative Meal (T6)
description: A restorative meal steeped with fragrant blooms and stabilizing roots.
use: When consumed, you regain 14d4+28 hit points.

use: When consumed, you gain 40 temporary hit points for 1 hour.

name: Focus Tea (T6)
description: A calming infusion that sharpens thought.
use: For 8 hours, you have 3 use(s): add 1d10 to an Int/Wis/Cha check after seeing the roll.

name: Battle Meal (T6)
description: A fiery dish that primes the body for combat.
use: For 1 minute after eating, you gain +3 to attack rolls and +5 to damage rolls.

name: Hero’s Feast (T6)
description: A legendary feast prepared from vital essence and rare botanicals.
use: Up to 12 creatures who partake gain 3d10 temporary hit points, and are cured of disease and poison.

name: Venomfire Dish (T6)
description: A dangerous dish that weaponizes venom and spores.
use: After eating, the next weapon hit within 1 hour deals an extra 4d6 poison damage. Target must succeed on a DC 16 Con save or be Poisoned until end of its next turn.

name: Restorative Meal (T7)
description: A restorative meal steeped with fragrant blooms and stabilizing roots.
use: When consumed, you regain 20d4+40 hit points.

name: Fortifying Meal (T7)
description: A rich broth that bolsters endurance.
use: When consumed, you gain 50 temporary hit points for 1 hour.

name: Sustaining Rations (T7)
description: Compact rations sealed with resin to preserve energy.
use: For the next 24 hours, you have advantage on Constitution saving throws made to resist exhaustion from forced march, starvation, or harsh travel. If you are exhausted, reduce your exhaustion level by 1.

name: Focus Tea (T7)
description: A calming infusion that sharpens thought.
use: For 8 hours, you have 4 use(s): add 1d12 to an Int/Wis/Cha check after seeing the roll.

name: Battle Meal (T7)
description: A fiery dish that primes the body for combat.
use: For 1 minute after eating, you gain +3 to attack rolls and +6 to damage rolls.

name: Hero’s Feast (T7)
description: A legendary feast prepared from vital essence and rare botanicals.
use: Up to 12 creatures who partake gain 4d10 temporary hit points, and are cured of disease and poison.

name: Venomfire Dish (T7)
description: A dangerous dish that weaponizes venom and spores.
use: After eating, the next weapon hit within 1 hour deals an extra 6d6 poison damage. Target must succeed on a DC 18 Con save or be Poisoned until end of its next turn.

name: Forged Weapon (Masterwork) (T1)
description: A weapon forged and balanced with quality fittings.
use: Create 1 weapon of your choice (rarity: Common). Masterwork: +1 to attack rolls (nonmagical; can be enchanted later).

name: Forged Armor (Masterwork) (T1)
description: Armor plates and straps fitted to the wearer.
use: Create 1 suit of armor of your choice (rarity: Common). Masterwork: +1 to AC (nonmagical; can be enchanted later).

name: Forged Shield (T1)
description: A reinforced shield with sturdy rivets and a solid boss.
use: Create 1 shield (rarity: Common) granting +1 bonus to AC (nonmagical; can be enchanted later).

name: Tool Set (T1)
description: A carefully crafted set of artisan tools.
use: Create 1 artisan tool set of your choice (rarity: Common). You gain +1 bonus to checks made with it.

name: Weapon Tuning Kit (T1)
description: A kit to hone edges and tune balance with crystalline alignment.
use: Choose 1 weapon you wield. For 1 hour, you gain +1 to attack rolls and +1 to damage rolls with it.

name: Forged Weapon (Magical) (T1)
description: A weapon forged with alloyed cores that awaken arcane resonance.
use: Create 1 weapon of your choice; it is a +1 magic weapon (rarity: Common).

name: Forged Armor/Shield (Magical) (T1)
description: Armor or shielding forged with rune-bound alloyed cores.
use: Create 1 suit of armor or a shield of your choice; it grants +1 bonus to AC and is magical (rarity: Common).

name: Forged Weapon (Masterwork) (T2)
description: A weapon forged and balanced with quality fittings.
use: Create 1 weapon of your choice (rarity: Uncommon). Masterwork: +1 to attack rolls (nonmagical; can be enchanted later).

name: Forged Weapon (Masterwork) (T6)
description: A weapon forged and balanced with quality fittings.
use: Create 1 weapon of your choice (rarity: Legendary). Masterwork: +3 to attack and +3 to damage (nonmagical; can be enchanted later).

name: Forged Armor (Masterwork) (T6)
description: Armor plates and straps fitted to the wearer.
use: Create 1 suit of armor of your choice (rarity: Legendary). Masterwork: +3 to AC (nonmagical; can be enchanted later).

name: Forged Shield (T6)
description: A reinforced shield with sturdy rivets and a solid boss.
use: Create 1 shield (rarity: Legendary) granting +3 bonus to AC (nonmagical; can be enchanted later).

name: Tool Set (T6)
description: A carefully crafted set of artisan tools.
use: Create 1 artisan tool set of your choice (rarity: Legendary). You gain +6 bonus to checks made with it.

name: Weapon Tuning Kit (T6)
description: A kit to hone edges and tune balance with crystalline alignment.
use: Choose 1 weapon you wield. For 1 hour, you gain +3 to attack rolls and +3 to damage rolls with it.

name: Forged Weapon (Magical) (T6)
description: A weapon forged with alloyed cores that awaken arcane resonance.
use: Create 1 weapon of your choice; it is a +3 magic weapon (rarity: Legendary). Additionally, once per long rest you can add +1d6 elemental damage (choose) to one hit.

name: Forged Armor/Shield (Magical) (T6)
description: Armor or shielding forged with rune-bound alloyed cores.
use: Create 1 suit of armor or a shield of your choice; it grants +3 bonus to AC and is magical (rarity: Legendary). Additionally, choose one damage type; you have resistance to it while wearing this armor.

name: Forged Weapon (Masterwork) (T7)
description: A weapon forged and balanced with quality fittings.
use: Create 1 weapon of your choice (rarity: Artifact). Masterwork: +3 to attack and +3 to damage (nonmagical). Artifact boon (DM) if later awakened.

name: Forged Armor (Masterwork) (T7)
description: Armor plates and straps fitted to the wearer.
use: Create 1 suit of armor of your choice (rarity: Artifact). Masterwork: +3 to AC (nonmagical). Artifact boon (DM) if later awakened.

name: Forged Shield (T7)
description: A reinforced shield with sturdy rivets and a solid boss.
use: Create 1 shield (rarity: Artifact) granting +3 bonus to AC (nonmagical). Artifact boon (DM) if later awakened.

name: Tool Set (T7)
description: A carefully crafted set of artisan tools.
use: Create 1 artisan tool set of your choice (rarity: Artifact). You gain +7 bonus to checks made with it.

name: Weapon Tuning Kit (T7)
description: A kit to hone edges and tune balance with crystalline alignment.
use: Choose 1 weapon you wield. For 1 hour, you gain +3 to attack rolls and +3 to damage rolls with it.

name: Forged Weapon (Magical) (T7)
description: A weapon forged with alloyed cores that awaken arcane resonance.
use: Create 1 weapon of your choice; it is a +3 magic weapon (rarity: Artifact). Additionally, once per long rest you can add +1d6 elemental damage (choose) to one hit. Additionally, it gains an artifact boon (DM) on creation.

name: Forged Armor/Shield (Magical) (T7)
description: Armor or shielding forged with rune-bound alloyed cores.
use: Create 1 suit of armor or a shield of your choice; it grants +3 bonus to AC and is magical (rarity: Artifact). Additionally, choose one damage type; you have resistance to it while wearing this armor. Additionally, it gains an artifact boon (DM) on creation.

name: Tailored Light Armor (T1)
description: Supple light armor with reinforced stitching and flexible lining.
use: Create 1 LIGHT armor of your choice (padded/leather/studded leather) (rarity: Common). Masterwork: +1 to AC (nonmagical; can be enchanted later).

name: Tailored Medium Armor (T1)
description: Layered medium armor with balanced flexibility and protection.
use: Create 1 MEDIUM armor of your choice (hide/chain shirt/scale mail/breastplate/half plate) (rarity: Common). Masterwork: +1 to AC (nonmagical; can be enchanted later).

name: Masterwork Disguise Kit (T1)
description: A disguise kit with custom-fit pieces and resilient adhesives.
use: Create 1 masterwork disguise kit (rarity: Common). Gain +1 to Deception checks made to maintain a disguise (stacks with proficiency).

name: Traveler’s Cloak (T1)
description: A weatherproof cloak lined for long journeys.
use: Create 1 Traveler’s Cloak (rarity: Common). Once per short rest, add +1 to a Stealth or Survival check after seeing the roll.

name: Quickdraw Bandolier (T1)
description: A bandolier with hidden loops and quick-release stitching.
use: Create 1 Quickdraw Bandolier (rarity: Common). You can draw or stow one extra item as part of the same interaction each turn; gain +1 to Sleight of Hand checks.

name: Cloak of Protection (T1)
description: A protective cloak inscribed with runes and sealed with resin.
use: Create a Cloak of Protection (rarity: Common). Gain +1 to AC and saving throws while worn.

name: Boots of Elvenkind (T1)
description: Soft boots infused with subtle arcane essence.
use: Create Boots of Elvenkind (rarity: Common). Steps make no sound; gain +1 to Stealth checks.

name: Tailored Light Armor (T2)
description: Supple light armor with reinforced stitching and flexible lining.
use: Create 1 LIGHT armor of your choice (padded/leather/studded leather) (rarity: Uncommon). Masterwork: +1 to AC (nonmagical; can be enchanted later).

use: Create 1 Quickdraw Bandolier (rarity: Very Rare). You can draw or stow one extra item as part of the same interaction each turn; gain +3 to Sleight of Hand checks.

name: Cloak of Protection (T5)
description: A protective cloak inscribed with runes and sealed with resin.
use: Create a Cloak of Protection (rarity: Very Rare). Gain +3 to AC and saving throws while worn.

name: Boots of Elvenkind (T5)
description: Soft boots infused with subtle arcane essence.
use: Create Boots of Elvenkind (rarity: Very Rare). Steps make no sound; gain +3 to Stealth checks.

name: Tailored Light Armor (T6)
description: Supple light armor with reinforced stitching and flexible lining.
use: Create 1 LIGHT armor of your choice (padded/leather/studded leather) (rarity: Legendary). Masterwork: +3 to AC (nonmagical; can be enchanted later).

name: Tailored Medium Armor (T6)
description: Layered medium armor with balanced flexibility and protection.
use: Create 1 MEDIUM armor of your choice (hide/chain shirt/scale mail/breastplate/half plate) (rarity: Legendary). Masterwork: +3 to AC (nonmagical; can be enchanted later).

name: Masterwork Disguise Kit (T6)
description: A disguise kit with custom-fit pieces and resilient adhesives.
use: Create 1 masterwork disguise kit (rarity: Legendary). Gain +3 to Deception checks made to maintain a disguise (stacks with proficiency).

name: Traveler’s Cloak (T6)
description: A weatherproof cloak lined for long journeys.
use: Create 1 Traveler’s Cloak (rarity: Legendary). Once per short rest, add +3 to a Stealth or Survival check after seeing the roll.

description: A bandolier with hidden loops and quick-release stitching.

name: Weapon Rune (Elemental) (T1)
description: A rune plate that can be bound to a weapon.
use: Bind to a weapon for 8 hours (rarity: Common): it deals +1 elemental damage (choose) on hit.

name: Armor Ward (Resistance) (T1)
description: A warding sigil for armor binding.
use: Bind to armor for 1 hour(s) (rarity: Common): gain resistance to one damage type (choose).

name: Focus Gem Imbuement (T1)
description: A gem infused for steady focus.
use: For 8 hours (rarity: Common), you gain +1 to spell attack rolls.

name: Spell-Storing Crystal (T1)
description: A crystal lattice that can hold spell energy.
use: Crystal has 2 charges (rarity: Common). Expend 1 charge to cast a stored spell of up to level 1 (stored spell set on creation).

name: Charm of Warding (T1)
description: A charm that deflects hostile magic.
use: For 8 hours (rarity: Common), you gain +1 to saving throws against spells.

name: Enchantment: Weapon Bonus (T1)
description: A permanent weapon enhancement.
use: Enchant 1 weapon (rarity: Common): it becomes a +1 magic weapon.

name: Enchantment: Armor Bonus (T1)
description: A permanent armor or shield enhancement.
use: Enchant 1 armor or shield (rarity: Common): it gains +1 bonus to AC.

name: Weapon Rune (Elemental) (T2)
description: A rune plate that can be bound to a weapon.
use: Bind to a weapon for 8 hours (rarity: Uncommon): it deals +1d4 elemental damage (choose) on hit.

name: Armor Ward (Resistance) (T2)
description: A warding sigil for armor binding.
use: Bind to armor for 2 hour(s) (rarity: Uncommon): gain resistance to one damage type (choose).

use: Enchant 1 armor or shield (rarity: Uncommon): it gains +1 bonus to AC.

name: Spell Scroll (T1)
description: A scroll inked with stable runes and sealed with resin.
use: Create 1 spell scroll (rarity: Common) containing a 1th-level spell (DM approval).

name: Ritual Ink Vial (T1)
description: Ink that improves scribing and scrollcraft.
use: For 24 hours (rarity: Common), gain +1 to checks to craft scrolls/wards or inscribe runes.

name: Warding Script (T1)
description: A prepared page holding a warding symbol.
use: Create 1 Warding Script (rarity: Common). Place on a surface (action). First creature entering a 5-ft square triggers: DC 12 Dex save or take 2d6 force (half). Lasts 24 hours.

name: Arcane Map Chart (T1)
description: A map-chart that shimmers with guiding essence.
use: For 24 hours (rarity: Common), gain +1 to navigation checks and checks to avoid getting lost.

name: Enchanted Quill (T1)
description: A quill that supports fast, precise scrollcraft.
use: Create 1 enchanted quill (rarity: Common). Once/long rest when crafting any Scribing item, reduce one component qty by 1 (min 1). Also grants +1 to checks to craft scrolls/wards.

name: Scroll of Protection (T1)
description: A rare scroll inscribed to repel a creature or creature type.
use: Create 1 Scroll of Protection (rarity: Common). Choose ONE creature you can see when read; it cannot enter the 5-ft barrier for 1 minute.

name: Glyph Script (Volatile) (T1)
description: A volatile glyph-script that can hold dangerous magic.
use: Create 1 Glyph Script (rarity: Common). Inscribe (action). When triggered: 10-ft radius DC 14 Dex save or take 3d6 force (half). Lasts until triggered or 7 days.

name: Spell Scroll (T2)
description: A scroll inked with stable runes and sealed with resin.
use: Create 1 spell scroll (rarity: Uncommon) containing a 2th-level spell (DM approval).

name: Ritual Ink Vial (T2)

name: Crafted Instrument (T1)
description: A well-crafted instrument, sealed and resonant.
use: Create 1 musical instrument of your choice (rarity: Common). While using it, gain +1 to Performance checks.

name: Carved Staff (Masterwork) (T1)
description: A carved staff treated with catalyst and resin.
use: Create 1 staff of your choice (nonmagical) (rarity: Common). Arcane focus; masterwork: +1 to spell attack rolls (nonmagical; can be enchanted later).

name: Bone-Rib Shield (T1)
description: A shield faced in hide and reinforced with bone ribs.
use: Create 1 shield (rarity: Common) granting +1 bonus to AC.

name: Totem Focus (T1)
description: A bone-and-resin totem dusted with arcane residue.
use: Create 1 totem focus (rarity: Common). Once/long rest add +1 to one healing or damage roll.

name: Carved Wand (Masterwork) (T1)
description: A carved wand sealed with resin and set with stabilizing root fiber.

name: Staff of the Woodlands (T1)
description: A legendary staff grown from empowered seed and bound with planar essence.
use: Create a Staff of the Woodlands-style staff (rarity: Common). Magical: +1 to spell attack rolls. Pass without Trace 1/long rest.
